amendment.description: To provide for the acquisition of an ASR-11 radar for the Jackson Hole, Wyoming Airport.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1956 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1956 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To provide for the acquisition of an ASR-11 radar for the Jackson Hole, Wyoming Airport.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1956 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1956 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Thomas.
